row.desc: Appends node to end of list with specified data.
Inserts node with specified data at specified index.
Returns the data of the node at the specified index.
Uses bubble sort to sort the linked list.
Returns the length of the list.
Displays the linked list in console.
Searches through list for the specified item, and deletes it.
Finds the item specified in the list, and appends a node with given data beforehand.
Finds the item specified in the list, and appends a node with given data directly next.
Returns true if specified item is in list, otherwise returns false.
Searches through list for an item, and returns the index.
